Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting us! I've researched the issue and found an article that I think will help you. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or visit the {!Organization.Name} Community.
We are always looking to improve our customer service, so would you mind taking this brief survey about your experience?
{!Case.SDO_Survey_URL__c}
Thank you! {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
